channel.title: A change to the forum's layout
channel.description:
As you've obviously noticed by now, the forum looks different. Moparisthebest has made various changes to the forum software which has allowed this change occur.
It has taken place mostly for look and feel reasons. However it has also been done to make moderating the forum (which is extremely large) easier on our staff members.
We hope you like the new look - we do. :) The current look isn't final; small changes may be made here and there if needed.
